attributes.action: If India has moved to Amber list so should Pakistan.
attributes.additional_details: Because it does not follow Logic or common sense to move a highly contagious region to Amber while leaving a less contagious country on the RED list. This is clear discrimination and is more political rather than based on the Safety of British citizens.
attributes.background: India that has one of the highest daily rates of Indian Variant (Delta) has been moved to Amber while Pakistan with far lower numbers remains on RED?? The threat of infections is far greater from INDIA than Pakistan. The Government need to also move Pakistan to Amber.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581974
